name: World Bet Inu
description: World Bet Inu is a new online betting platform where users can bet on different sport events, starting with the World Cup 2022 Qatar. It's been built on the Ethereum blockchain. ETH will also be used to place bets and will rewarded to users who correctly predict the outcome of games. The World Bet Inu platform will provide a safe, secure and decentralized way for users to bet on the World Cup in first place. By using blockchain technology, the platform will be able to offer users a level of security and transparency that is nog possible with traditional online gambling sites. But what if you don't like gambling? Thats nog a problem. Word Bet Inu has his own staking platform were you can stake your $WBI tokens and earn profit.
